description.lang: This product is a separate trigger detector equips with magnet and magnetic sensor and wireless transmit functionality. When themagnet and the magnetic sensor is separated, the product issue wireless alarm signal to the associated gateway. It is suitable for avariety of installation environment requirements, with doors and windows open, close the realtime detection and cover tamper,battery level status report function.
Z-Wave Plus Lifeline, assigned to send unsolicited report of magnet open/close detection status and tamper cover status, battery level to the associated device as soon while the status is change.
assigned to send Notification report to other device while the sensor detected door open/close.
assigned to send Basic Set On Command to control other device while the sensor detected door open.
assigned to send Basic Set Off Command to control other device while the sensor detected door open.
assigned to send Basic Set On Command to control other device while the sensor detected door close.
assigned to send Basic Set Off Command to control other device while the sensor detected door close.
assigned to send Notification report to other device while the tamper detected on/off.
assigned to send Binary sensor report to other device while the tamper detected on/off.
assigned to send Basic Set On Command to control other device while the tamper detected open.
assigned to send Basic Set Off Command to control other device while the tamper detected open.
